indemnificationTypeCode.description: Indicates the Indemnification Type, which will determine the Indemnification letter template that the lender will sign if they elect the indemnification route. Potential values are '5_YEAR', and 'LIFE_OF_LOAN'

qcOutcomeCd.description: For a QC review, this is the selected QC outcome code (e.g. ACCEPTABLE, MODERATE, or MATERIAL)
